name: Lessons From My Nightmares
description: "Lessons From My Nightmares" is an award-winning short film by filmmaker Kira Bursky. The film follows the story of a girl dealing with insomnia due to compartmentalized thoughts and feelings. When she does sleep, she is haunted by nightmares. All of the main visuals were generated by creative machine learning techniques and then composited + animated in After Effects. To create the nightmares, Kira fed the machine 4,600 behind-the-scenes pictures from her All Around Artsy film production sets. This film was made as a part of the virtual Runway Flash Residency. This is Kira Bursky's first complete short film 1/1 NFT. The new owner of the NFT will receive a downloadable HD file of the full film as well as an optional physical print of a still from the film.
